segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked if she doesn’t move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, but she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while the floor is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and she won’t even see it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
